system.notes: Must mount on Prow or Keel. Can fire 4 Torpedos per salvo, can store 16 (+4 in tubes). If component is damaged/destroyed but not unpowered/depressurised while torpedos are loaded, roll 1d100, on a 95-00, component explodes, destroying it and doing 2d5 Hull Damage. +4VU speed to torpedo on turn launched, and  Torpedos have +10 to hit.
